message: Let's start fair. I'm willing to give you a small share, but it's better than nothing. Let's see what you think.
Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 5000.  Let's meet in the middle.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve a larger share.
We're getting closer.  I'm ready to be a little more flexible, but I need a bigger piece of the pie.
I'm not willing to give up too much more, but I'll give you a slightly better offer. This is my last compromise.
Time is running out. This is my final offer.  If you want to get anything at all, you need to accept.
I'm not going to accept a bad deal. I'll take a chance and hope you'll come back with a better offer.
We're almost out of time.  This is my last chance to get a decent share.  Take it or we both get nothing.
I'm not going to accept a deal that's so heavily skewed in your favor. I'll take a chance and hope we can come to a better agreement in the next round.
This is it.  I'm giving you a tiny bit, but I need most of it to make this worthwhile.  Accept it, or we both lose everything.
I'm not going to accept a deal that's this one-sided. I'd rather we both get nothing than accept such an unfair offer.
